Judul: Guest Editorial Special Issue on mobile biometrics
Abstrak:
Biometrics involves the use of physical and/or behavioural traits for
human authentication and identification. It is a well-established and
growing discipline supporting many practical applications including
cyber security and mobile devices. In recent years, stimulated by
hardware advances and a rapidly growing consumer market built
around increasingly powerful mobile phones and other portable
platforms, mobile biometrics has become an important challenge
for biometric applications and will continue to do so. It is
predicted that the global market for mobile biometrics will grow
substantially in the coming years.
